Search trails called from map.js using location search.
Order of installation - com_savetrail com_searchTrails - drops _trailReview, _trailList and then creates _trailList com_searchTrailReviews plgContentSearchReview - drops _trailReview and then creates _trailReview com_contentsubmit_mod - uses _trailReview com_trailDisplay - js functions use _trailReview and _trailList plgSearchTrailReviews - uses _trailReview
